thread.title: Donald Trump Got His Daughter's Name Wrong On Twitter — And The Wrong Ivanka Responded In Just The Right Way!
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Got His Daughter's Name Wrong On Twitter — And The Wrong Ivanka Responded In Just The Right Way! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Donald Trump Got His Daughter's Name Wrong On Twitter — And The Wrong Ivanka Responded In Just The Right Way!
text:
Classic person who doesn't think before they tweet dad move, Donald Trump .
It's no secret the President-elect is über proud of daughter Ivanka Trump , and he wanted to cheer the 35-year-old on from Twitter during her CNN interview on Monday night.
Related: Trump Might Be Kicking The Press Out Of The White House! 
But when live-tweeting the soon-to-be First Daughter's interview, the bronzed businessman accidentally tweeted at the wrong Ivanka!
The incoming POTUS quoted a tweet from another Twitter user praising his oldest daughter, writing: 
" @drgoodspine : @realDonaldTrump @Ivanka Trump is great, a woman with real character and class."
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 17, 2017 
One problem: his daughter's handle is @IvankaTrump, not @Ivanka!
Trump accidentally tweeted at U.K.-based Twitter user Ivanka Majic , who has been using the social media platform since 2007.
Related: Ivanka & More Celebs Honor MLK On Martin Luther King Day! 
And apparently, this was the wrong Ivanka to have a mix up with — the self-described Labor party supporter fired back at the politician, encouraging him to educate himself on climate change instead of perpetually tweeting!
On Tuesday morning, Majic wrote:
@realDonaldTrump @drgoodspine And you're a man with great responsibilities. May I suggest more care on Twitter and more time learning about #climatechange . pic.twitter.com/kBMEGZYtig 
— Ivanka Majic (@ivanka) January 17, 2017 
Ha! Way to take advantage of a golden opportunity!
[ Image via WENN . ] 
Tags: cnn , donald trump , internet , ivanka majic , ivanka trump , oops! , politik , sad sad , social media , twitter , viral: news
